summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 27th Avenue from Yesler Way to 236 feet north of East Jefferson Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9267 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
